org.jivesoftware.smack

Interface ChatManagerListener


  • public interface ChatManagerListener
    A listener for chat related events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void chatCreated(Chat chat, boolean createdLocally)
      Event fired when a new chat is created.

    • Method Detail

      • chatCreated

        void chatCreated(Chat chat,
               boolean createdLocally)
        Event fired when a new chat is created.
        Parameters:
        chat - the chat that was created.
        createdLocally - true if the chat was created by the local user and false if it wasn't.
